data.title: 2012 Fact Sheet: 2012 Olympic & Paralympic Games Facts
data.meta_description: 2012 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games will be held in London from July 27 - August 12, 2012 and August 29 - September 9, 2012 respectively. Over 10,500 athletes are expected to participate in the Olympics across 26 sports and 300 events, while over 4,200 athletes will compete in the Paralympics in 20 sports. New events include women's boxing and mixed doubles tennis. The Games will take place primarily at venues within the new Olympic Park in East London.
